text: Nza raari tugɨra tɨgɨp, nza ntige kha tugen ŋamki, nza khaŋ suaŋri. “Ntigera”, nza ntigera ŋamki. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde zazera nde bevbevira, nde guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, nde buni vhuuin warira suaŋv wari ndavi havharɨri. Nde mbe suaŋv mbe ndɨkndɨgi khavɨri. Nde muuŋv kɨrga tɨvi mbatɨgi nde the guigirim, ana won ndava havhargirga.
